text: Alberto Carpani (April 23, 1956 – May 11, 2020) was an Italian singer. He was best known for his Italo disco releases in the late 1970's and early 1980's as Albert One, and his Eurodance release "Sing a Song Now Now" in 1999 as A.C. One. He was also a DJ and music producer. He was born in Pavia, Italy. Carpani died of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease on May 11, 2020 in Portofino, Italy at the age of 64.Addio ad Albert One: il cantante e dj pavese è stato portato via dal Covid, aveva 64 anni ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Italy Category:Italian singers Category:People from Pavia
title: Alberto Carpani
